title: Michigan Gov Granholm Under SCOTUS Consideration

content: It's not yet decided. Jenny is drawing opposition from Republicans and Democrats. One of the later is from her home state. Michigan Gov. Jennifer Granholm (D), who is on President Obama’s shortlist for the Supreme Court, is attracting criticism from both sides of the aisle as she visits the nation’s capital on Monday. Granholm is in Washington for an event unrelated to the high court. But conservative groups took the opportunity Monday to criticize her. More importantly, Granholm is taking barbs from a senior Democratic member of Congress from her home state: House Judiciary Committee Chairman John Conyers Jr. "http://thehill.com/leading-the-news/granholm-is-in-dc-today-attracting-dem-gop-critics-2009-05-18.html"
